message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $100 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm happy to negotiate, I can't sell it for less than $105. This product is high-quality and a steal at this price.
I understand the product is high-quality, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $95 for it.
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but I need to get at least $100 for this product. It's my final offer.
I'm really close to walking away, but I'll make one more offer. I'll pay $98 for the product.
